title: Sleepy Beauty
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Kanata, Kaanaataa! You’ll catch a cold if you sleep in a place like this okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Nnah…. It’s Karin-chan~. Good morning….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Kanata, you really are the sleeping beauty that will sleep everywhere<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan isn’t the sleeping beauty~. Because, the sleeping beauty is a~lways asleep, but Kanata-chan will properly wake up if woken up so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>If you say it like that then yeah<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That’s why, Kanata-chan isn’t the sleeping beauty~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Then, the sleepy beauty that is always sleepy♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>The sleepy beauty…. Maybe it’s not so bad~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Alright then, would the sleepy beauty join prince Karin for their dance lesson together. Please, take my hand♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Geez, Karin-chan, don’t suddenly go into cool mode like that~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
